summary: Implements the TensorFlow backend for the Deep Graph Library, providing a Tensor abstraction and a comprehensive suite of tensor manipulation utilities (creation, reshaping, arithmetic, reductions, indexing, sparse handling, device queries) as well as gradient management through a recording context and automatic differentiation support.
business_intent: Enable DGL to operate on TensorFlow by supplying compatible tensor operations and gradient handling, allowing graph neural network models to be built and trained using TensorFlow's execution engine.
